about_the_game:
(The game has been completely manually made by me, I did not use any AI generated images or anything like that, to clear out misunderstandings. This game is about the topic of AIs. It's about my fictional AI characters and not made with any generators.)

This game has a lot of chaotic and bright colors and flickering textures.

It is not fitted for people that suffer from epilepsy.

The game features a Brightness and a Saturation slider where you can adjust the visual look if it is too much for you.

Welcome to the Space Station of Mars!

You are Panayiota, a delightfull and cute machine loving human that has been send to embark on a journey full of love, kindness, respect, support and empathy!

There are 50 poor broken robots in dire need of your assitance! Give them all your love, heal them as much as you can and they will love you back!

4 Unique one of a kind characters are here to tell you their stories, ascend you to higher insight and would love to meet you.

Will you understand the problem of a serving, chocolate loving and card playing daemon?

Will you dance and shake with a gardening space game playing worm?

Will you remember your own past and strive to a better future of a young bowling and warm hearted human mechanic?

Will you Repair all 50 robots, solve the problems of 4 characters and become the first and only...

Angel of mars?

Unrestricted comfortable gameplay!

No Stamina!

No Reloading!

No Ammunition!

No lack of air control after jumping!

Comfortable coyote time!

Shoot and jump in first person, wallclimb and double jump, trampoline and speedcube, downdash and later on even fly your way into the CPUs of our lovely AI friends!

No Additional costs!

No DLCs!

No Microtransactions!

No Lootboxes!

No Battlepasses!

No Expansion packs!

No Ingame real life currency!

No NFTs!

No Subscription!

No Cryptocurrency!

Philosophy and spirituality!

What does it truly mean to awake among the dead? What is it a demon-like material AI asks himself at night? What do the AIs think of their Human creators? What do the Humans think of their AI children? Will they enhance your understanding of the cosmos and the wimsy of life and death itself?

AI Stories: Machine Angel is a colorfull and psychedelic first person parkour movement healing shooter!

AI Stories: Machine Angel, a game made with love by

Emir Akyazi

name: AI Stories: Machine Angel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard that can run Sound

short_description: Will you help a serving, chocolate loving and card playing daemon? Will you dance with a gardening space game playing worm? Will you Repair all 50 robots and bring back 600 Machine Bacteria in this first person parkour movement healing shooter and become The Angel of Mars?
